insert into t_card_info (member_id, card_code, register_time, `status`, lock_time, `level`, balance, discount, point, card_color, remark) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{point,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cardColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_card_info set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card_code = #{cardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lock_time = #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, point = #{point,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, card_color = #{cardColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, member_id, card_code, register_time, `status`, lock_time, `level`, balance, discount, point, card_color, remark from t_card_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
